links.title: New Apple Inc. (AAPL) Patent May Finally Address Long-Time Complaint
links.description: While Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has earned a reputation for having a horde of product loyalists for its offerings, that doesn't mean that there aren't some nagging complaints in regards to its more popular items. One of those complaints has to do with an issue that MacBook owners are all too familiar with, but a new patent for the tech giant points to the possibility that it will be finally addressed once and for all.
